sen.j: 楽々荘（らくらくそう）は京都府亀岡市にある旧田中源太郎邸を使用したホテル。
sen.e: Rakuraku-so is a hotel using the former Gentaro TANAKA's residence in Kameoka City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Rakuraku-so is a hotel using the former Gentaro TANAKA's residence in Kameoka City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Rakuraku-so is a hotel using the former Gentaro TANAKA's residence in Kameoka City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 明治32年（1899年）建築の洋館と七代目小川治兵衛作庭の日本庭園が有名。
sen.e: The western style building built in 1899 and the Japanese garden desgined by seventh Jihee OGAWA are famous
The western style building built in 1899 and the Japanese garden desgined by seventh Jihee OGAWA are famous
The western style building built in 1899 and the Japanese garden designed by seventh Jihe OGAWA are famous.
sen.cmt: designedスペル訂正しました。Jiheに訂正しました。ピリオド補足。

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: summary
summary
Summary

sen.j: 明治30年代、京都鉄道会社（現在の山陰本線）の創設者で貴族院議員である田中源太郎が自らの生家を改築したものである。
sen.e: In around 1897 to 1906, Gentaro TANAKA, who was the founder of the Kyoto railway company (present Sanin Main Line) and a member of Kizokuin (the upper house of the Imperial Diet under the Constitution of the Empire of Japan), reformed the house where he was born into the present form.

In around 1897 to 1906, Gentaro TANAKA, who was the founder of the Kyoto railway company (present Sanin Main Line) and a member of Kizokuin (the upper house of the Imperial Diet under the Constitution of the Empire of Japan), reformed the house where he was born into the present form.

In around 1897 to 1906, Gentaro TANAKA, who was the founder of the Kyoto railway company (present Sanin Main Line) and a member of Kizokuin (the upper house of the Imperial Diet under the Constitution of the Empire of Japan), reformed the house where he was born into the present form.

sen.j: 煉瓦造りの洋館は明治32年に本邸として、書院造りの和館は迎賓館として建設。
sen.e: A brick-made western style building was constructed in 1899 as his main residence, with a Japanese shoin-style building as the guesthouse.
A brick-made western style building was constructed in 1899 as his main residence, with a Japanese shoin-style building as the guesthouse.
A brick-made western style building was constructed in 1899 as his main residence, with a Japanese shoin-style building as the guesthouse.

sen.j: 洋館と和館の前に広がる650坪の枯池泉回遊式庭園は七代目小川治兵衛（植治）の作庭で、安土桃山時代の石燈籠や鉄製井筒などが亀山城から移設されている。
sen.e: The 650-tsubo (3.3 square meters/tsubo) walking-through garden with a dried pond and water-spring in front of the western style building and the Japanese style building was designed by seventh Jihee Ogawa (Ueji), and stone lanterns and iron wells in the Azuchi-Momoyama period was brought here from Kameyama-jo Castle.

The 650-tsubo (3.3 square meters/tsubo) walk-through garden with a dried pond and water-spring in front of the western style building and the Japanese style building was designed by seventh Jihee Ogawa (Ueji), and stone lanterns and iron wells in the Azuchi-Momoyama period was brought here from Kameyama-jo Castle.

The approx. 2,149 square meters walk-through garden with a dried pond and water-spring in front of the western style building and the Japanese style building was designed by seventh Jihe OGAWA (Ueji), and stone lanterns and iron wells in the Azuchi-Momoyama period was brought here from Kameyama-jo Castle.
sen.cmt: 650坪をsquare metersに換算しました→approx. 2,149 square metersJihe OGAWAに訂正しました。

sen.j: 昭和23年から「保津川観光ホテル楽々荘」の施設になり、現在は洋館2階は客室、1階はカフェレストラン、庭園はガーデンカフェ、ウェディングに使用されている。
sen.e: Since 1948, it has become "Hozugawa Kanko Hotel Rakurakuso (Rakuraku-so Hotel for Hozugawa sightseeing)," and now the second floor of the western building is used for guest rooms, the first floor for a café restruant and the garden for another café and for wedding.

Since 1948, it has become the "Hozugawa Kanko Hotel Rakurakuso (Rakuraku-so Hotel for Hozugawa sightseeing)," and now the second floor of the western building is used for guest rooms, the first floor for a café restruant and the garden for another café and for weddings.

Since 1948, it has become the 'Hozugawa Kanko Hotel Rakurakuso' (Rakuraku-so Hotel for Hozugawa sightseeing), and now the second floor of the western building is used for guest rooms, the first floor for a café restaurant and the garden for another café and for weddings.
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合わせて"を'に訂正しました。restaurantスペル訂正しました。
